    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Applicant
    Represents an applicant in the BTO Management System.
    ApplicantLoader
    Utility class for loading Applicant objects from a CSV file.
    ApplicantUI
    Boundary class for Applicant user interface.
    Application
    Represents a BTO application submitted by an applicant.
    ApplicationController
    Controller for application-related operations in the BTO Management System.
    ApplicationRepository
    Repository class for managing Application entities with file-based persistence.
    ApplicationStatus
    Enumeration representing the possible statuses of a BTO application.
    ApplicationViewer
    Boundary class for displaying application information.
    ConsolePasswordUI
    Console-based implementation of the PasswordUI interface.
    ConsoleUtils
    Utility class for console input and validation.
    CsvUtils
     
    DateUtils
    Utility class for date operations
    Displayable
     
    EnquiriesController
    Controller for managing enquiries in the BTO Management System.
    EnquiriesViewer
    Boundary class for displaying enquiry information.
    Enquiry
    Represents an enquiry submitted by an applicant regarding a BTO project.
    EnquiryRepository
    Repository class for managing Enquiry entities.
    FileBasedRepository<T,ID>
    An abstract generic repository class for file-based persistence using Java serialization.
    FileUtils
    Utility class for file operations
    HDBManager
    Represents an HDB Manager user in the BTO Management System.
    HDBManagerController
    Controller handling business logic for HDB Manager operations.
    HDBManagerUI
    Provides the user interface for HDB Managers to interact with the BTO Management System.
    HDBOfficer
    Represents an HDB Officer user in the BTO Management System.
    HDBOfficerController
     
    HDBOfficerUI
    Boundary class for HDB Officer user interface.
    IDGenerator
    Utility class for generating unique IDs
    InputValidator
    Utility class for validating user inputs
    LogUtils
    Utility class for logging operations
    Main
    Main entry point for the BTO Management System application.
    ManagerLoader
    Utility class for loading HDBManager objects from a CSV file.
    MaritalStatus
    Enumeration for Marital Status in the BTO Management System.
    Neighborhood
    Enumeration of all supported HDB neighborhoods in the BTO Management System.
    OfficerLoader
    Utility class for loading HDBOfficer objects from a CSV file.
    OfficerRegistration
    Represents a registration request for an HDB Officer to join a project team.
    OfficerRegistrationController
    Controller for managing HDB Officer registrations to projects.
    OfficerRegistrationRepository
    Repository class for managing officer registrations to projects.
    OfficerRegistrationViewer
    Boundary class for displaying officer registration information.
    PasswordChanger
    Interface defining the contract for password change functionality.
    PasswordPolicy
    Interface for defining password validation policies.
    PasswordService
    Service class for handling password-related operations for users.
    PasswordUI
    Interface for user interaction during password operations.
    Project
    Represents a Build-To-Order (BTO) project in the BTO Management System.
    ProjectController
    Controller for project-related operations in the BTO Management System.
    ProjectLoader
    Utility class for loading projects from CSV files.
    ProjectRepository
    Repository class for managing Project entities, using project name as the unique identifier.
    ProjectViewer
    Utility class for displaying project information in the CLI.
    RegexPasswordPolicy
    Implementation of the PasswordPolicy interface that validates passwords using a regular expression.
    RegistrationStatus
    Enumeration representing the possible statuses of an HDB Officer's registration to join a project team in the BTO Management System.
    ReportGenerator
    Utility class for generating reports
    Repository<T,ID>
    A generic repository interface that defines basic CRUD operations for entity persistence.
    UnitOfWork
    The UnitOfWork class encapsulates and manages access to the core repositories used within the application, providing a single point of coordination for data operations.
    User
    Represents a generic user in the BTO Management System.
    UserLoader
    Utility class for loading User objects of various types from a CSV file.
    UserLookupService
    Service interface for looking up user information based on NRIC.
    UserRepository
    Repository class for managing User entities.
    ValidationUtils
    Utility class for validation operations
    WelcomeBoundary
    Boundary class that starts the BTO Management System.
